examples: He was riding his cycle home when he was hit by a lorry.
Iba en bicicleta a casa cuando lo atropelló un camión.
We went for a cycle ride on Sunday.
Fuimos a dar un paseo en bicicleta el domingo.
Lots of people arrived in cars or on cycles.
Llegó mucha gente en coches o bicicletas.
They completed their journey by cycle.
